text:
Hello,
First Happy new year to the team !

Now for the enhancement request:
Currently when you work with a Test plan that requires correlation and analysis with a website that sends and receives medium to big responses (JSON, XML ...) you don't have a lot of data visible and have always to scroll.

The Upper Panel (Name, Comment and File) is useless but takes 1/4 of a screen.

It would be much more User Friendly to be able to collapse it.
creator: support@ubikloadpack.com
